title: JVP commemorates Laborer’s Day
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The May Day rally organized by the Janatha Vimukthi Peramuna has commenced from the P.D. Sirisena Stadium in Colombo.
The main rally is due to take place in front of the Fort Railway Station.
Our correspondents stated that the May Day rally of JVP in Anuradhapura has also begun.
